data.value: Note that this palette is global (i.e., setting it once changes the colors for all subsequent calls to
) and that it affects only the the colors below
also accepts a custom coloring function through its
keyword, which is more flexible and non-global.
Ability to reset the palette with
A list of matplotlib color codes.  The order of the color codes is the order in which the colors are cycled through when color thresholding in the dendrogram.
, resets the palette to its default (which are matplotlib default colors C1 to C9).
Set list of matplotlib color codes for use by dendrogram.
